store the value...

body:
According to the [doc](https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/gradle-plugin#updating-gradle), it should be compatible with Gradle 4.4+. If it doesn't, I guess there is a bug in either the plugin or Gradle.

|Plugin version|Required Gradle version|
|--------------|------------------------|
|3.1.0+              |4.4+                                 |
